item.description:
Everyone loves a Happy Hour! Come join us as we celebrate the end of a long workweek and the beginning of the holiday weekend!

We're meeting at the Westbrook Lobster House for a drink or two. Great specials include...Bud and Bud Light $2.00...premium draft beers  $4.00...Margheritas  $5.00...Daiquiris  $4.00...House Wines...$3.00, to name a few. Also appetizer specials starting at $3.00.

We will be there at 5:00pm, but come when you can. We can do dinner later at the restaurant...a good choice for Good Friday...FISH! If you are coming for dinner...we will be doing that about 7:30pm. So, if you cannot come for Happy Hour, join us for dinner...we would love to have you!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or the Meetup sign...Cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Happy Hour & Dinner @ Westbrook Lobster in Wallingford!
